sources.name: Eurobarometer (2017)
sources.description:
Data published by Eurobarometer Interactive
Data publisher's source Public opinion surveys
Link http://ec.europa.eu/commfrontoffice/publicopinion/index.cfm/Chart/index
Retrieved 25 April 2017

The Eurobarometer provides estimates for dated surveys. In some years, there are some countries with multiple surveys. In those cases, we provide yearly averages.

variables.name: Share of people who are happy (Eurobarometer 2017)
variables.description: Share of people who say they are 'very satisfied' or 'fairly satisfied' with their life. Full question asks: "On the whole are you very satisfied, fairly satisfied, not very satisfied or not at all satisfied with the life you lead?"
